snippet: The deal for PSA Group of France to buy the Opel and Vauxhall brands comes at a politically and economically difficult time....

headline.main: Germany's Turkish Community Say Erdogan Went Too Far With Nazi Comments
headline.print_headline: Germany's Turkish Community Say Erdogan Went Too Far With Nazi Comments

lead_paragraph: The deal for PSA Group of France to buy the Opel and Vauxhall brands comes at a politically and economically difficult time.
